title: DedDedAttack

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will have the defense, attack, abilities, attributes, and investigative results of another role.
- This role cannot be: Any role from a good faction (Town, City, Army, etc.), Neutral (Benign), Execution Immune Roles.

desc:
Post 558
*Also has the power to cause a game-canning host error twice!*
